Reviews.Title: The Seller did not describe the item accurately
Reviews.Author: C. Loke
Reviews.Content: The Item is listed as 'like new' with no scratches, when we received the item, and there were scratches and signs of the phone dropped. The seller confessed by email about this, and offered no viable solution other than to break the phone for a replacement at the store. Overall the phone still works, but disappointed about the accuracy and honesty.

Reviews.Title: Speaker is not working,,,,
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: Speaker is not working,,,,,what to do now,,,,,,the price is not worth,,,for not working iphone,,,,it will take time now to go at apple store,,,,,

Reviews.Title: in good working order and delivery in time
Reviews.Author: gaston
Reviews.Content: The device very well, flawless delivery, all we do not know if I understood wrong or what but it came without accessories, and this device without the original aaccesorios difficult to walk well.

Reviews.Title: Great and Fast Phone
Reviews.Author: Tomtucker
Reviews.Content: Pros1. 4 inch screen2. 1136X640 around 320 dpi resolution . Screen is very sharp and bright3. LTE with a great battery life. Lasts almost two days with moderate usage.4. Powerful A6 CPU5. Thinner than the iphone 4s6. Metal Back. No more flaky glass back.7. The Maps features and Siri, siri navigationCons1. Feels very light almost too light2. Lightning port makes all your previous accessories redundant3. NO NFC. Come on Apple its about time4.A6 is still a dual core processor. Better than A9 but less powerful than the A15

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Love it, was exactly what I expected, and better! Loving the phone very much! No problems what so ever! Thank you!

Reviews.Title: All in all I'm satisfied.
Reviews.Author: Taz Angel
Reviews.Content: Good product, phone was ID locked and was not informed of this, but I was able to bypass it. So I'm happy with the results, the buyer was sympathetic with my situation and offered a full refund. Can't beat the price, awesome sale.

Reviews.Title: Great product Great vendor
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: My iPhone 5 arrived and it was in great condition. Came in the original box with all the accompanying accessories which had never been used. Phone looks great works better. And communication with this vender was very responsive.If I could have asked for more from them it would be to provide some faster 3 day / 5 day delivery methods.

Reviews.Title: The phone is not new at all
Reviews.Author: steven
Reviews.Content: I dont thnik it is an new iphone.And the cable is not original.So i dont like this phone,and i will not buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy 3rd party iphones from amazom.
Reviews.Author: Kennyxeast
Reviews.Content: The camera had three black marks in the lense, the power button does not work at all, and it dies when the battery isnt even below 30%, but only sometimes. Certain features consistanty freeze up, like my when i get off the phone my calllog freezes for minutes.

Reviews.Title: shipping fast!
Reviews.Author: Yueqi ni
Reviews.Content: it still has 7 month warrentyit almost the new one !it sells at a low price!like a new!
